crown.name: CSK_Application_FlowConfig
crown.desc: CSK application to provide the FlowConfig feature of CSK modules. + Check the UI of this CSK application to configure the system. + {empty} + Concerning required CSK modules to run this application, please refer to the README within GIT.

event.name: OnNewStatusCSKStyle
event.desc: Notify UI style to use for CSK modules.

event.name: OnNewStatusWelcomeAppAvailable
event.desc: Notfiy if SICK_WelcomeApp is available on device.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty
